name: places/ChIJqVLx3oT2wokRUJU1R2FrMfw
formattedAddress: 65 Fort Washington Ave # 25, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 65 Fort Washington Ave # 25, New York, NY 10032, USA

originalText.text: My daughter has been in this daycare since the age of 1 and has grown so much physically, developmentally and emotionally. From learning to walk and talk and now being so independent at 3 years old it is definitely a Miracle to see her progress in life. Not only in excelling from milestone to milestone but creating memories with her friends and teachers whom have become family.When a child wakes up with joy and eagerness to learn at her school daily you know they are in perfect hands. I am forever grateful for Little Miracles Group Family Daycare for loving my child as one of their own and always showing support to our family with tender loving care. I have built a trust with the teachers and feel safe when I drop off my daughter, there's no doubt in my heart that she's in perfect hands and we are forever blessed. If you're looking for not just any ordinary daycare but a place for education, fun, and love; Little Miracles Group Family Daycare is the perfect choice for you and your little ones.

originalText.text:
A parents biggest fear is where to leave there child and with whom. My first daycare experience wasn’t too great. My daughter would cry every morning. I decided to go with my motherly instinct and changed her to this Gem “ Little Miracles Daycare”. I have never been at ease knowing that my daughter is in great hands and is cared for by genuinely wonderful people. She bonded quickly with the caregiver. She’s excited every morning to go to “school”. Her communication skills have improved tremendously and has learned great mannerism.
So happy we chose Little Miracles Daycare !!!
We are forever thankful ❤️

originalText.text: Little Miracles are truly miracle workers. They are amazing and like family. My daughter has grown so much in the months she has been there and she’s excited to go to “school” everyday. We are truly grateful for this team and can’t recommend and thank them enough. True rock stars. Vanessa is amazing and prompt when I have questions or concerns. The schedule is out in advance so you can plan ahead for any scheduled closures / trainings. Their transparency is like no other.

text.text: Little Miracles are truly miracle workers. They are amazing and like family. My daughter has grown so much in the months she has been there and she’s excited to go to “school” everyday. We are truly grateful for this team and can’t recommend and thank them enough. True rock stars. Vanessa is amazing and prompt when I have questions or concerns. The schedule is out in advance so you can plan ahead for any scheduled closures / trainings. Their transparency is like no other.

originalText.text:
We have been absolutely delighted with our experience at Little Miracles Group Family Daycare. From the very beginning, they have shown a level of responsiveness and care that has put our minds at ease. Our daughter started attending the daycare when she was just 6 months old, and we couldn't have asked for a better place for her to grow and learn.

One of the standout aspects of Little Miracles Group Family Daycare is their responsiveness. Whenever we have had questions or concerns, the staff, particularly Vanessa, Massiel, and Janifer, have been incredibly prompt and attentive. They truly understand the importance of open communication and have always made themselves available to address any inquiries we had. This level of responsiveness has given us a sense of comfort and trust in their ability to care for our little one.

Speaking of care, we cannot say enough about the love and attention our baby receives. They genuinely care for each child, and it shows in the way they interact with them. It's heartwarming to see our daughter's face light up when she sees her caregivers in the morning.

From the engaging activities to the nutritious meals provided, every aspect of their program demonstrates their dedication to the well-being and development of the children in their care. Our daughter has learned so much during her time at the daycare, and we attribute that growth to the exceptional care and guidance she receives from the staff.

In summary, we wholeheartedly recommend Little Miracles Group Family Daycare to any parent in search of a responsive and caring daycare. Vanessa, Massiel, Janifer, and the entire staff go above and beyond to create a loving environment where children can thrive. We feel truly blessed to have found such a wonderful place for our daughter to spend her days.

Thank you for providing our family with peace of mind and for taking such great care of our precious little one.

originalText.text: I enrolled my girl since she was 1 year old. She is 4 now and it was the best decision I could have ever made. Care and learning were always 100%. Thanks to Vanessa, Massiel and Jennifer for always taking care of and guiding my daughter in the first years of her life. I definitely recommend it.
